languages.text: "Я обещаю отнестись к духу машины с подобающим почтением. Вы можете наблюдать за дознанием".
"You have my word that I will treat the machine spirit with due respect. You may observe the interrogation."
languages.original_text: "Я обещаю отнестись к духу машины с подобающим почтением. Вы можете наблюдать за дознанием".

traits.locale_text: "You have my word that I will treat the machine spirit with due respect. You may observe the interrogation."
"You have my word that I will treat the machine spirit with due respect. You may observe the interrogation."
"You have my word that I will treat the machine spirit with due respect. You may observe the interrogation."
"You have my word that I will treat the machine spirit with due respect. You may observe the interrogation."
"You have my word that I will treat the machine spirit with due respect. You may observe the interrogation."
"You have my word that I will treat the machine spirit with due respect. You may observe the interrogation."

languages.text: « Je vous promets de traiter l'esprit de la machine avec le respect qui lui est dû. Libre à vous de rester pour assister à l'interrogatoire si vous le désirez. »
languages.original_text: "You have my word that I will treat the machine spirit with due respect. You may observe the interrogation."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous promets de traiter l'esprit de la machine avec le respect qui lui est dû. Libre à vous de rester pour assister à l'interrogatoire si vous le désirez. »

languages.text: «Le doy mi palabra: trataré al espíritu máquina con el debido respeto. Puede observar el interrogatorio».
languages.original_text: "You have my word that I will treat the machine spirit with due respect. You may observe the interrogation."

traits.locale_text: «Le doy mi palabra: trataré al espíritu máquina con el debido respeto. Puede observar el interrogatorio».

languages.text: “我可以向你保证，我会以应有的敬意对待机魂。你可以旁听这场问询。”
languages.original_text: "You have my word that I will treat the machine spirit with due respect. You may observe the interrogation."

traits.locale_text: “我可以向你保证，我会以应有的敬意对待机魂。你可以旁听这场问询。”

languages.text: 「約束する。私は機械精霊に礼儀正しく接しよう。この尋問を見ていくがいい」
languages.original_text: "You have my word that I will treat the machine spirit with due respect. You may observe the interrogation."

traits.locale_text: 「約束する。私は機械精霊に礼儀正しく接しよう。この尋問を見ていくがいい」

languages.text: "Ihr habt mein Wort, dass ich den Maschinengeist mit dem nötigen Respekt behandeln werde. Ihr dürft das Verhör beobachten."
languages.original_text: "You have my word that I will treat the machine spirit with due respect. You may observe the interrogation."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt mein Wort, dass ich den Maschinengeist mit dem nötigen Respekt behandeln werde. Ihr dürft das Verhör beobachten."

languages.text: "Bu makineye gereken hürmeti göstereceğime dair sana söz veriyorum. Sorguyu gözlemleyebilirsin."
languages.original_text: "You have my word that I will treat the machine spirit with due respect. You may observe the interrogation."
